channel.title: Blogs on Douglas Hellinger
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Douglas Hellinger

item.title: World Cup Troubleshootout
item.description: Every four years the Fifa World Cup ignites my passion to troubleshoot a bunch of technical problems so that I can enjoy the tournament in the same way I grew up - with highly-biased English commentary.

item.title: An Explainer Using the 1000 Most Used English Words
item.description: The other day, I learned about the Up-Goer Five Editor - a text editor that challenges you to explain something using only the 1000 most-used English words.
